p: FGM concentrations averaged 20.00 ± 1.84 ng/g when foraging enrichment was present and 19.34 ± 1.69 ng/g when exploring enrichment was present. Overall, FGM concentrations were not significantly related to the stated enrichment goal (F1,105 = 0.48, p = 0.49) or enrichment item (F4,94 = 1.51, p = 0.21; Table S10). Values for the remaining fixed factors are based on models using the stated enrichment goal and were non-significant for: time in the study (F1,98 = 0.05, p = 0.81), sample collection time (F1,104 = 0.28, p = 0.60), the interaction of stated goal and samplecollection time (F1,105 = 0.43, p = 0.51), amount of time spent using enrichment in seconds (F1,103 = 0.07, p = 0.79), amount of time spent pacing in seconds (F1,101 = 0.09, p = 0.76), count of enrichment events (F1,99 = 0.21, p = 0.65), count of pacing events (F1,103 = 0.004, p = 0.95), total affiliative interactions (F1,99 = 0.05, p = 0.81), or total agonistic interactions (F1,106 = 0.74, p = 0.39).
